lgp.core.evolution.fitness

Class FitnessContext<T>

  • lgp.core.evolution.fitness.FitnessContext<T>

  • public class FitnessContext<T>

    A mapping of program to fitness cases using a given fitness function.

    Used to evaluate the fitness of a program on a collection of fitness cases.

    • Constructor Detail

      • FitnessContext

        public FitnessContext(java.util.List<? extends lgp.core.environment.dataset.Instance<? extends T>> fitnessCases,
                      Program<T> program,
                      kotlin.jvm.functions.Function2<? super lgp.core.evolution.population.Program<T>,? super java.util.List<? extends lgp.core.environment.dataset.Instance<? extends T>>,java.lang.Double> fitnessFunction)

        A mapping of program to fitness cases using a given fitness function.

        Used to evaluate the fitness of a program on a collection of fitness cases.

        Parameters:
        fitnessCases -

        A collection of fitness cases to evaluate the program on.

        Fitness cases are just instances in a dataset which will be loaded into the program as a set of input registers, and the output of the program compared to the output attribute of the fitness case by the fitness function of the given context.

        program - A program that the fitness cases are evaluated on.
        fitnessFunction - A function that tests the given program on the given fitness cases.

    • Method Detail

      • fitness

        public double fitness()

        Returns the fitness as determined by this context.
